name: The 3rd World Conference on Gender Equality
content: The 3rd World Conference on Gender Equality is set for June 12-14, 2025 in Vienna, renowned as the social and cultural hub of Central Europe. This event presents an invaluable opportunity for researchers to showcase their latest work in a prestigious location. Regarded as a highly esteemed event, the conference strives to offer an outstanding global platform where academics, researchers, industry professionals, and students can exchange their research findings with experts worldwide. All submitted full papers will undergo rigorous peer review, evaluating their originality, technical or research depth, accuracy, and alignment with the conferenceâ€™s thematic focus. Each paper presented at the conference will receive a Digital Object Identifier (DOI) from Crossref, ensuring permanent and reliable identification. The abstract book and proceedings will be submitted to Google Scholar for indexing, enhancing their visibility and accessibility in academic circles. Additionally, the Conference Proceedings, which include all accepted papers, will be published with an ISBN Number, facilitating easy reference and citation. Furthermore, all submitted papers will have the chance to be published in esteemed indexed international journals, providing authors with broader dissemination of their research outcomes.
